channel.title: Ubuntu Web Server :: CIS 527 Textbook
channel.description: Note It appears that MySQL will now be installed with TLS enabled on Ubuntu 20.04, so you may not have to do that step. –Russ YouTube Video Resources Install MySQL on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS Linux from LinuxConfig.org How To Install and Secure phpMyAdmin on Ubuntu 18.04 from DigitalOcean (works for 20.04) How To Install the Apache Web Server on Ubuntu 20.04 from DigitalOcean How To Secure Apache with Let’s Encrypt on Ubuntu 20.
